synopsis.text: Love is in the air in the Yoshiwara district, but not in the usual way! A mysterious incense known as 'Aizen Kou' has the power to make anyone fall in love with the first person they see after smelling it. The Yorozuya and the entire district find themselves under its spell, including the stoic Hyakka captain, Tsukuyo, whose secret crush on Gintoki Sakata, the Yorozuya leader, is intensified by the incense. As chaos unfolds, Tsukuyo and the Yorozuya must fight their affections and work together to find the culprit behind the love potion arc and restore normalcy to Yoshiwara. Will they succeed, or will love conquer all? Find out in the 'Love Potion' story arc, adapted from 'Gintama' manga volumes 65 and 66.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
